狭に: (せに) - (used as 〜も狭に) with little space remaining; being almost full
狭まる: (せばまる) - to narrow; to contract
狭む: (せばむ) - to squeeze in; to jam in
狭める: (せばめる) - to narrow; to reduce; to contract
狭域: (きょういき) - narrow; short range; micro
狭小: (きょうしょう) - narrow; cramped; small-sized
狭心症: (きょうしんしょう) - heart attack; angina pectoris
狭軌鉄道: (きょうきてつどう) - narrow-gauge railway
狭間: (hazama) - intervalo, espaço, interstício, limiar; vale, garganta, ravina; intervalo, espaço, interstício, limiar; vale, garganta, ravina; fresta (em uma parede), ameia, ilhó
狭鼻猿類: (きょうびえんるい) - catarrhine (primate of infraorder Catarrhini having nostrils that are close together, esp. the Old World monkeys of family Cercopithecidae)
狷介: (けんかい) - obstinate; stubborn; headstrong; self-centred; self-centered
狷介不羈: (けんかいふき) - (yoji) stubbornly sticking to one's own convictions; being stubbornly independent
狷介固陋: (けんかいころう) - (yoji) stubbornly sticking to old ways; narrow-mindedly rejecting other people's views
狷介孤高: (けんかいここう) - (yoji) stubborn and aloof
狸: (り) - Tanuki , tanuki (Cachorro Guaxinim), raccoon dog; sly dog, sly old fox, sly fox, cunning devil, craftiness, sly person, someone who makes evil plans without ever breaking their poker face
狸丼: (たぬきどん) - hot rice served with tenkasu and tempura dipping sauce on top
狸囃子: (たぬきばやし) - tanuki drumming on their stomachs
狸汁: (たぬきじる) - tanuki soup; raccoon-dog soup
狸爺: (たぬきじじい) - cunning old man
狸蕎麦: (たぬきそば) - soba with tempura batter
狸親父: (たぬきおやじ) - sly (cunning) old man
狸饂飩: (たぬきうどん) - noodles with bits of deep-fried tempura batter
狼: (ろう) - Wolf , wolf (Lobo cinzento); wolf in sheep's clothing, womanizer
狼少年: (おおかみしょうねん) - boy who cried wolf
狼烟: (のろし) - beacon/skyrocket/signal fire/smoke signals; starting shot/starting signal
狼煙: (ろうえん) - beacon/skyrocket/signal fire/smoke signals; starting shot/starting signal
狼狽: (ろうばい) - confusion; dismay; consternation; panic
狼狽える: (うろたえる) - to be flustered; to lose one's presence of mind
狼狽気味: (ろうばいぎみ) - (yoji) being rather confused; looking somewhat dismayed (perturbed)
狼藉: (ろうぜき) - violence; outrage; riot; confusion; disorder
狼魚: (オオカミウオ) - Bering wolffish (Anarhichas orientalis)
猊下: (げいか) - your highness; your grace; your eminence
猖獗: (しょうけつ) - spreading; infesting; running rampant
猖獗をきわめる: (しょうけつをきわめる) - to become rampant; to be rife
猖獗を極める: (しょうけつをきわめる) - to become rampant; to be rife
猛: (mou) - feroz, muito energético; feroz; extremo, severo
猛り狂う: (たけりくるう) - to rage; to rampage
猛り立つ: (たけりたつ) - (esp. 猛り立つ) to rage; (esp. 哮り立つ) to howl
猛る: (たける) - to rage/to be fierce; to be excited
猛スピード: (もうスピード) - great speed; recklessly fast speed
猛勉強: (もうべんきょう) - studying extra hard
猛勢: (もうぜい) - (usu. もうせい) great strength; courageous army/valiant troops
猛反対: (もうはんたい) - strong opposition; vehement opposition
猛反発: (もうはんぱつ) - furious opposition; strong opposition; vehement protest
猛将: (もうしょう) - brave general; brave warrior; courageous general
猛抗議: (もうこうぎ) - vehement objection; bitter opposition
猛暑日: (もうしょび) - extremely hot day (i.e. 35 degrees Celsius or greater)
猛烈: (mouretsu) - feroz, intenso, severo, violento, forte, veemente, terrível, terrível
猛烈社員: (もうれつしゃいん) - (yoji) gung-ho organization (corporate) man (woman); go-getter worker; hard-driving worker; workaholic employee
猛煙: (もうえん) - heavy smoke; thick smoke
猛爆: (もうばく) - heavy bombing; intensive bombing
猛牛: (もうぎゅう) - raging bull; ferocious bull
猛特訓: (もうとっくん) - training extra hard
猛犬注意: (もうけんちゅうい) - (on a sign) Beware of dog
猛獣: (もうじゅう) - wild animal; beast of prey
猛獣使い: (もうじゅうつかい) - wild-animal tamer
猛省: (もうせい) - serious reflection or soul-searching
猛禽類: (もうきんるい) - birds of prey (of order Falconiformes or Strigiformes); raptors
